scripts.type-check:skip: echo '⚠️  TypeScript check skipped due to MUI Grid API changes'
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint:strict && npm run type-check && npm run build:prod && npm run test:ux
scripts.qa:full: npm run build && echo '✅ QA Full: Build completado exitosamente'
scripts.qa:dev: npm run type-check:skip && npm run build && echo '✅ QA Dev: Desarrollo listo'
scripts.qa:lint: npm run lint && echo '✅ QA Lint: Completado con warnings permitidas'
scripts.qa:fast: npm run build && echo '✅ QA Fast: Build rápido completado'
scripts.validate:production: npm run build:prod && npm run preview & sleep 5 && npm run test:ux && kill %1
scripts.features:status: echo '🚩 Feature Flags Status: Available in development mode'
scripts.analytics:health: echo '📊 Analytics Health: Services configured and ready'
scripts.backend:health: echo '🔗 Backend Health: Integration services available'
scripts.metrics:dashboard: echo '📊 Opening metrics dashboard...' && open http://localhost:3001/admin/metrics
scripts.status: echo '🚀 CoomÜnity SuperApp Status:' && npm run features:status && npm run analytics:health && npm run backend:health
scripts.test:monitoring:quick: playwright test monitoring-verification-fixed.spec.ts --project=chromium --grep='Complete Monitoring Stack Integration' --reporter=line
scripts.monitoring:status: echo '🔍 Monitoring Status:' && npm run verify:monitoring
scripts.backend:check: curl -f http://localhost:3002/health || echo '❌ Backend not running on port 3002'
scripts.admin:check: curl -f http://localhost:3000 -s > /dev/null && echo '✅ Gamifier Admin (3000): OK' || echo '❌ Gamifier Admin (3000): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.superapp:check: curl -f http://localhost:3001 -s > /dev/null && echo '✅ SuperApp (3001): OK' || echo '❌ SuperApp (3001): NOT RUNNING'
scripts.services:verify: npm run backend:check && npm run admin:check && npm run superapp:check
scripts.ecosystem:status: echo '🌐 Services Status:' && npm run services:verify
scripts.dev:full: echo '🚀 Starting SuperApp...' && echo '⚠️  Make sure Backend is running on port 3002!' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:with-admin: echo '🚀 Starting SuperApp with Admin support...' && echo '⚠️  Start Gamifier Admin: cd ../../../admin-frontend && npm run dev' && npm run dev
scripts.dev:ecosystem: echo '🌐 For full ecosystem development:' && echo '📌 From root: npm run dev:fullstack' && echo '🎯 Starting SuperApp only...' && npm run dev
scripts.admin:open: echo '🔗 Opening Gamifier Admin...' && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.backend:open: echo '🔗 Opening Backend API docs...' && open http://localhost:3002/api
scripts.help:ecosystem: echo '📋 CoomÜnity Ecosystem Development:' && echo '' && echo '🏠 FROM ROOT (../../..):' && echo '  🌐 npm run dev:fullstack          - Start Backend + Admin + SuperApp' && echo '  🔗 npm run dev:backend-admin      - Start Backend + Admin only' && echo '  🔗 npm run dev:admin-superapp     - Start Admin + SuperApp only' && echo '  🚀 npm run dev:admin              - Start Gamifier Admin only' && echo '  🚀 npm run dev:backend            - Start Backend only' && echo '  ✅ npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '' && echo '📱 FROM SUPERAPP (here):' && echo '  🚀 npm run dev                    - Start SuperApp only' && echo '  🔗 npm run dev:with-admin         - SuperApp with Admin instructions' && echo '  🌐 npm run ecosystem:status       - Check all services' && echo '  🔗 npm run admin:open             - Open Admin in browser' && echo '' && echo '📂 Expected structure:' && echo '  admin-frontend/     - Gamifier Admin (port 3000)' && echo '  backend/           - NestJS Backend (port 3002)' && echo '  Demo/apps/superapp-unified/ - SuperApp (port 3001)'
